      • collide

        public boolean collide(java.util.List<java.util.List<GameObject>> map,
                       int direction)
        returns false because waka can walk through it.
        Specified by:
        collide in class GameObject
        Parameters:
        map - Current map
        direction - Integer value representing the direction to check the collision.
        Returns:
        True if a collision occurs, false if it does not.

      • consumeItem

        public void consumeItem(GameManager manager)
        Is overriden in inherited powerup classes. Air pathblocks do nothing.
        Parameters:
        manager - GameManager instance.

      • hasItem

        public boolean hasItem()
        Returns:
        true if the block still has an item on it, otherwise false.

      • setHasItem

        public void setHasItem(boolean bool)
        Parameters:
        bool - true to restore the item on the pathblock again.
